Description

Simple skeletonisation methods for grids.

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input

Output

Options
MethodChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] Standard [1] Hilditch's Algorithm [2] Channel Skeleton Default: 0
InitialisationChoiceINIT_METHODAvailable Choices: [0] Less than [1] Greater than Default: 1
